trans-unit.source: Deleting []. This action cannot be reverted. Are you sure?
trans-unit.target: 正在刪除 []。此動作無法復原。確定要繼續嗎？

trans-unit.source: import file not valid, missing "type" or "distortions"?
trans-unit.target: 匯入檔案無效，缺少 "type" 或 "distortions"？

trans-unit.source: Radius from center of the output (%)
Radius from center of the input (degrees)

trans-unit.target: 啟用 MeganeX 8K 驅動程式

trans-unit.source: Driver setting file not found, please launch SteamVR
trans-unit.target: 找不到驅動程式設定檔，請啟動 SteamVR
找不到驅動程式資料夾

trans-unit.source: the folder seems not include driver file, please check again
trans-unit.target: 資料夾似乎不包含驅動程式檔案，請重新檢查。

trans-unit.source: please launch SteamVR to finish the installation
trans-unit.target: 請啟動 SteamVR 以完成安裝
Shiftall 驅動程式亦已停用
SteamVR 的 100% 渲染解析度

trans-unit.source: Render resolution for 1:1 sample per panel pixel
trans-unit.target: 每個面板像素 1:1 個取樣的渲染解析度

trans-unit.source: Check driver update and launch SteamVR
trans-unit.target: 檢查驅動程式更新並啟動 SteamVR

trans-unit.source: Any changes to these settings will require a game restart to be visible. The hidden area meshes are used to mask out the corners of the screen. They can increase performance in games that use them. Click for more information.
trans-unit.target: 變更這些設定後，需重啟遊戲才會顯示效果。隱藏區域網格可用於遮蔽螢幕邊角，在有支援的遊戲中能提升效能。

trans-unit.source: Inverts the meshes to only show the areas that will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 反轉網格，使其僅顯示將被隱藏的區域。

trans-unit.source: Requires restarting SteamVR to apply changes.
trans-unit.target: 需要重啟 SteamVR 以套用變更。

trans-unit.source: Requires restarting the game to apply changes.
trans-unit.target: 需要重啟遊戲以套用變更。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the distortion shader in SteamVR's compositor with a custom one that allows for more customization.
trans-unit.target: 以一個可提供更多自訂選項的著色器，取代 SteamVR 合成器中的預設失真著色器。

trans-unit.source: Enables the custom shader. This will replace shaders in SteamVR.
trans-unit.target: 啟用自訂著色器。此選項將會取代 SteamVR 中的著色器。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the contrast of the image. When higher than 50, the colors in the image will be expanded away from the midpoint. When lower than 50, the colors in the image will be contracted towards the midpoint.
trans-unit.target: 調整影像的對比度。高於 50 時，顏色會遠離中點擴張；低於 50 時，顏色會朝向中點收縮。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the midpoint of the contrast. This controls the center of the contrast adjustment. For example when this is 100 all colors will move towards or away from white. When this is 0 all colors will move towards or away from black, which gives a brightening or darkening effect.
trans-unit.target: 調整對比度的中點，此設定控制對比度調整的基準顏色。例如：當設為 100，所有顏色會朝向白色或遠離白色變化；當設為 0，所有顏色則會朝向黑色或遠離黑色變化，進而產生整體變亮或變暗的效果。

trans-unit.source: Applies linear contrast to the image before gamma correction instead of after Generally contrast looks better with this option off but it can be useful for some effects.
trans-unit.target: 在 Gamma 校正前而非之後，對影像套用線性對比度。一般來說，關閉此選項的對比度效果較佳，但它對某些特殊效果可能有用。

trans-unit.source: Applies contrast to each eye separately which allows you to correct for differences in displays. This will be applied in addition to the above contrast.
trans-unit.target: 分別對左右眼套用對比度，讓您能校正兩眼顯示器的差異。此設定會附加在上述的通用對比度設定之上。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the chroma of the image. When higher than 50, the colors in the image will be exaggerated. When lowered all the way to 0 the image will be grayscale.
trans-unit.target: 調整影像的色度。高於 50 時，顏色會變得更鮮豔；一路降至 0 時，影像會變成灰階。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the gamma of the image. This controls brightness is mapped to the display's brightness. Higher gamma values make darker areas of the image brighter.
trans-unit.target: 調整影像的 Gamma 值。它控制輸入亮度與顯示器亮度之間的映射關係。較高的 Gamma 值會使影像的暗部區域變得更亮。

trans-unit.source: This forcibly disables the mura correction on any headset that has it like the Vive.
trans-unit.target: 在任何具備 Mura 校正的頭戴式顯示器（如 Vive）上強制停用該功能。

trans-unit.source: Forces the black level clamp to be disabled. This can make headsets like the Vive darker at the expense of more smearing.
trans-unit.target: 強制停用黑階箝位。這能讓像 Vive 這類頭戴式顯示器的黑色變得更深，但代價是會增加拖影。

trans-unit.source: Enables sRGB color correction. The MeganeX is a Display-P3 display and normally colors are oversaturated by mapping the srgb outputs of applications to the full color space. When this is enabled, only the srgb portion of the display is used, which can make colors look more accurate.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 sRGB 色彩校正。MeganeX 是一部 Display-P3 顯示器，一般情況下，應用程式的 sRGB 輸出會被直接映射到其完整色域上，造成顏色過飽和。啟用此選項後，將僅使用顯示器的 sRGB 部分，讓顏色看起來更準確。

trans-unit.source: Enables the custom shader for the MeganeX 8K.
trans-unit.target: 為 MeganeX 8K 啟用自訂著色器。

trans-unit.source: Enables the custom shader for all other HMDs. Non-native SteamVR headsets likely won't work yet.
trans-unit.target: 為所有其他 HMD 啟用自訂著色器。非原生支援 SteamVR 的頭戴式顯示器可能尚無法運作。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the Custom Headset driver will run the MeganeX superlight 8K.
trans-unit.target: 啟用後，自訂頭戴式顯示器驅動程式將會以 MeganeX superlight 8K 模式運作。

trans-unit.source: The resolution to run the DisplayPort connection at.
trans-unit.target: 設定 DisplayPort 連線的運作解析度。

trans-unit.source: The distortion profile to use for the headset. See the distortion tab for more options.
trans-unit.target: 選擇頭戴式顯示器要使用的失真設定檔。請參閱「失真」分頁以獲得更多選項。

trans-unit.source: Displays information about the resolution SteamVR will be run at and what the optimal resolution is. Settings like fov will effect this. This will only be updated while the MeganeX is actively running under this driver.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 SteamVR 的運作解析度以及最佳解析度的相關資訊。視野 (FOV) 等設定會影響此結果。此資訊僅會在 MeganeX 以本驅動程式主動運作時更新。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts how zoomed in the distortion profile is. This can be used to correct for diopters with higher set diopters needing a positive zoom. However it will induce some amount of warping.
trans-unit.target: 調整失真設定檔的縮放程度。此功能可用於校正屈光度，較高的屈光度設定需要正值的縮放。然而，這也會導致一定程度的影像扭曲。

trans-unit.source: This feature automatically dims the display to protect the panel from screen burn-in when the headset is stationary. The display remains bright for the movement time whenever it is moved more than the threshold'.
trans-unit.target: 此功能會在頭戴式裝置靜止時自動調暗螢幕，以保護面板並預防影像烙印。每當移動幅度超過閾值時，顯示器將在「移動時間」內保持明亮。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the stationary dimming feature.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用靜止時變暗功能。

trans-unit.source: The minimum amount of rotation in degrees that will reset the stationary dimming timer.
trans-unit.target: 重設靜止變暗計時器所需的最小旋轉角度 (度)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time in seconds that the display will remain bright after movement.
trans-unit.target: 偵測到移動後，顯示器將保持明亮的時間長度 (秒)。

trans-unit.source: The minimum brightness percentage that the display will dim to when stationary.
trans-unit.target: 靜止時，顯示器會變暗至的最低亮度百分比。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time it takes to go from bright to dim.
trans-unit.target: 從明亮狀態轉為變暗狀態所需的時間。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time it takes to go from dim to bright.
trans-unit.target: 從變暗狀態恢復為明亮狀態所需的時間。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the hidden area meshes.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用隱藏區域網格。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the top of the hidden area mesh near your nose.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近鼻子之上方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the bottom of the hidden area mesh near your nose.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近鼻子之下方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the top of the hidden area mesh near your ears.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近耳朵之上方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the bottom of the hidden area mesh near your ears.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近耳朵之下方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The number of vertices used to create each section of the hidden area mesh. Higher values increase the smoothness of the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立各部分隱藏區域網格的頂點數量。較高的數值會增加網格的平滑度。

trans-unit.source: These settings have defaults that should not need to be changed but are provided for experimentation.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定具有預設值，通常不需變更，但我們仍提供這些選項供您實驗。

trans-unit.source: The minimum brightness level that the display will reach. Increase this if you love the smeary grey of LCD headsets.
trans-unit.target: 顯示器將達到的最低亮度級別。如果您喜愛 LCD 頭戴式顯示器那種帶有拖影的灰色，可以提高此值。

trans-unit.source: This value is added to the IPD value. Just use the main ipd slider and leave this 0. This will probably be removed soon.
trans-unit.target: 此數值會被加到 IPD 值上。請直接使用主 IPD 滑桿並將此處保持為 0。此選項可能很快會被移除。

trans-unit.source: Shifts the subpixels of the display using the UV distortions to improve color fringing and sharpness. The default is correct for the oled panel.
trans-unit.target: 利用 UV 失真來位移顯示器的子像素，以改善色邊和銳利度。預設值適用於 OLED 面板。

trans-unit.source: The resolution of the distortion mesh. Higher values prevent small wavy artifacts in the corners of the lenses but makes other settings laggier. The default pretty much eliminates the artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 失真網格的解析度。較高的數值可防止鏡片邊角出現微小的波浪狀瑕疵，但會使其他設定反應變慢。預設值基本上已可消除此類瑕疵。

trans-unit.source: Randomly adds up to 3 degrees to the FOV on every run to prevent sharp burn in at the edge of the fov on the display. It is recommended you do not turn this off in case you or the next person wants to increase the fov.
trans-unit.target: 每次執行時隨機增加最多 3 度的視野 (FOV)，以防止顯示器在視野邊緣產生清晰的烙印。為預防您或下一位使用者想要增加視野，建議您不要關閉此功能。

trans-unit.source: The multiplier for the 100% render resolution width. This allows you to change the aspect ratio of the resolution as well as reach resolutions outside the 20%-500% range of the SteamVR slider. This may require a restart to apply.
trans-unit.target: 100% 渲染解析度寬度的乘數。這讓您能變更解析度的長寬比，並能達到超出 SteamVR 滑桿 20%-500% 範圍的解析度。此設定可能需要重新啟動才能套用。

trans-unit.source: The multiplier for the 100% render resolution height. This allows you to change the aspect ratio of the resolution as well as reach resolutions outside the 20%-500% range of the SteamVR slider. This may require a restart to apply.
trans-unit.target: 100% 渲染解析度高度的乘數。這讓您能變更解析度的長寬比，並能達到超出 SteamVR 滑桿 20%-500% 範圍的解析度。此設定可能需要重新啟動才能套用。
從 VSync 到光子產生的秒數
已安裝的驅動程式版本
上次運行的驅動程式版本

trans-unit.source: This custom shader has the possibility to completely break SteamVR after a future SteamVR update. Valve has no obligation to maintain compatibility with this modification. Disable it if you have issues or compatibility problems.
trans-unit.target: 此自訂著色器在未來的 SteamVR 更新後，有可能完全毀損 SteamVR。Valve 沒有義務維持對此修改的相容性。若您遇到問題或相容性狀況，請停用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Samples subpixels from the correct locations in the image to improve sharpness by lighting up individual subpixels. This can have a remarkable effect on the MeganeX where it can extract detail from more than 300% of the 1:1 resolution. The Vive is also supported but the improvement is less noticeable.
trans-unit.target: 從影像中的正確位置對子像素進行採樣，透過點亮單獨的子像素來提升銳利度。這在 MeganeX 上的效果尤其顯著，能從 1:1 解析度中提取超過 300% 的細節。Vive 也支援此功能，但改善效果較不明顯。

trans-unit.source: The inter pupillary distance of the virtual cameras in SteamVR applications. You set the headset's physical IPD in the Shiftall Configurator. This IPD should be matched with what you set in the Shiftall Configurator to get the correct world scale.
trans-unit.target: 設定 SteamVR 應用程式中虛擬攝影機的瞳孔間距 (IPD)。您應在「Shiftall 設定工具」中設定頭戴式裝置的實體 IPD。此處的 IPD 應與您在「Shiftall 設定工具」中設定的值相符，以獲得正確的世界比例。

trans-unit.source: The maximum that will be displayed horizontally in the headset. The actual fov can be lower if this fov can't fit on the screen after distortion. This may sometimes require restarting the game to fully apply.
trans-unit.target: 頭戴式顯示器將顯示的最大水平視野 (FOV)。如果此視野大小在經過失真校正後無法容納於螢幕內，實際視野可能會較低。此設定有時可能需要重啟遊戲才能完全套用。

trans-unit.source: The maximum that will be displayed vertically in the headset. The actual fov can be lower if this fov can't fit on the screen after distortion. This may sometimes require restarting the game to fully apply.
trans-unit.target: 頭戴式顯示器將顯示的最大垂直視野 (FOV)。如果此視野大小在經過失真校正後無法容納於螢幕內，實際視野可能會較低。此設定有時可能需要重啟遊戲才能完全套用。

trans-unit.source: Displays information about the resolution SteamVR will be run at and what the optimal resolution is. Settings like fov will effect this. This will only be updated while the MeganeX is actively running under this driver.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 SteamVR 的運作解析度以及最佳解析度的相關資訊。視野 (FOV) 等設定會影響此結果。此資訊僅會在 MeganeX 以本驅動程式主動運作時更新。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts how zoomed in the distortion profile is. This can be used to correct for diopters with higher set diopters needing a positive zoom. However it will induce some amount of warping.
trans-unit.target: 調整失真設定檔的縮放程度。此功能可用於校正屈光度，較高的屈光度設定需要正值的縮放。然而，這也會導致一定程度的影像扭曲。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the color of the headset. This can also be used to decrease or increase the brightness of the scene.
trans-unit.target: 調整頭戴式顯示器的顏色。此功能也可用於降低或增加場景的亮度。

trans-unit.source: This feature automatically dims the display to protect the panel from screen burn-in when the headset is stationary. The display remains bright for the movement time whenever it is moved more than the threshold'.
trans-unit.target: 此功能會在頭戴式裝置靜止時自動調暗螢幕，以保護面板並預防影像烙印。每當移動幅度超過閾值時，顯示器將在「移動時間」內保持明亮。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the stationary dimming feature.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用靜止時變暗功能。

trans-unit.source: The minimum amount of rotation in degrees that will reset the stationary dimming timer.
trans-unit.target: 重設靜止變暗計時器所需的最小旋轉角度 (度)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time in seconds that the display will remain bright after movement.
trans-unit.target: 偵測到移動後，顯示器將保持明亮的時間長度 (秒)。

trans-unit.source: The minimum brightness percentage that the display will dim to when stationary.
trans-unit.target: 靜止時，顯示器會變暗至的最低亮度百分比。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time it takes to go from bright to dim.
trans-unit.target: 從明亮狀態轉為變暗狀態所需的時間。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time it takes to go from dim to bright.
trans-unit.target: 從變暗狀態恢復為明亮狀態所需的時間。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the hidden area meshes.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用隱藏區域網格。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the top of the hidden area mesh near your nose.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近鼻子之上方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the bottom of the hidden area mesh near your nose.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近鼻子之下方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the top of the hidden area mesh near your ears.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近耳朵之上方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The radius of the visible area at the bottom of the hidden area mesh near your ears.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏區域網格中，靠近耳朵之下方可見區域的半徑。

trans-unit.source: The number of vertices used to create each section of the hidden area mesh. Higher values increase the smoothness of the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立各部分隱藏區域網格的頂點數量。較高的數值會增加網格的平滑度。

trans-unit.source: These settings have defaults that should not need to be changed but are provided for experimentation.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定具有預設值，通常不需變更，但我們仍提供這些選項供您實驗。

trans-unit.source: The minimum brightness level that the display will reach. Increase this if you love the smeary grey of LCD headsets.
trans-unit.target: 顯示器將達到的最低亮度級別。如果您喜愛 LCD 頭戴式顯示器那種帶有拖影的灰色，可以提高此值。

trans-unit.source: This value is added to the IPD value. Just use the main ipd slider and leave this 0. This will probably be removed soon.
trans-unit.target: 此數值會被加到 IPD 值上。請直接使用主 IPD 滑桿並將此處保持為 0。此選項可能很快會被移除。

trans-unit.source: Shifts the subpixels of the display using the UV distortions to improve color fringing and sharpness. The default is correct for the oled panel.
trans-unit.target: 利用 UV 失真來位移顯示器的子像素，以改善色邊和銳利度。預設值適用於 OLED 面板。

trans-unit.source: The resolution of the distortion mesh. Higher values prevent small wavy artifacts in the corners of the lenses but makes other settings laggier. The default pretty much eliminates the artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 失真網格的解析度。較高的數值可防止鏡片邊角出現微小的波浪狀瑕疵，但會使其他設定反應變慢。預設值基本上已可消除此類瑕疵。

trans-unit.source: Randomly adds up to 3 degrees to the FOV on every run to prevent sharp burn in at the edge of the fov on the display. It is recommended you do not turn this off in case you or the next person wants to increase the fov.
trans-unit.target: 每次執行時隨機增加最多 3 度的視野 (FOV)，以防止顯示器在視野邊緣產生清晰的烙印。為預防您或下一位使用者想要增加視野，建議您不要關閉此功能。

trans-unit.source: The multiplier for the 100% render resolution width. This allows you to change the aspect ratio of the resolution as well as reach resolutions outside the 20%-500% range of the SteamVR slider. This may require a restart to apply.
trans-unit.target: 100% 渲染解析度寬度的乘數。這讓您能變更解析度的長寬比，並能達到超出 SteamVR 滑桿 20%-500% 範圍的解析度。此設定可能需要重新啟動才能套用。

trans-unit.source: The multiplier for the 100% render resolution height. This allows you to change the aspect ratio of the resolution as well as reach resolutions outside the 20%-500% range of the SteamVR slider. This may require a restart to apply.
trans-unit.target: 100% 渲染解析度高度的乘數。這讓您能變更解析度的長寬比，並能達到超出 SteamVR 滑桿 20%-500% 範圍的解析度。此設定可能需要重新啟動才能套用。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the 1:1 resolution that the super sampling downscale area filter is applied. The subpixel shifts with the custom shader can make use of the 500% resolution above 1:1. Without subpixel sampling this value can be lowered to downscale the input so that all pixels contribute to the output. Toggling off advanced supersample filtering in SteamVR will disable this.
trans-unit.target: 套用超級採樣縮小區域濾鏡的 1:1 解析度百分比。透過自訂著色器的子像素位移，可以利用超過 1:1 的 500% 解析度。在沒有子像素採樣的情況下，可以降低此值以縮小輸入，讓所有像素都對輸出有所貢獻。在 SteamVR 中關閉「進階超級採樣濾鏡」將會停用此功能。
從 VSync 到光子產生的秒數
已成功解除安裝驅動程式

trans-unit.source: This corrects color uniformity issues created by the lenses. On the MeganeX this fixes the warmer colors in the center of the lenses.
trans-unit.target: 修正由鏡片引起的色彩均勻度問題。在 MeganeX 上，此功能可修正鏡片中心的偏暖色調。

trans-unit.source: Enables 10 bit dithering. This allows a 10 bit input to be shown on an 8 bit display. Pixels are dithered spatially and temporally to allow more colors to be represented. This works for the MeganeX and all other native headsets but will only have an effect for 10 bit VR applications.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 10 位元抖色。這允許 10 位元的輸入顯示在 8 位元的顯示器上。像素會透過空間和時間上的抖動來呈現更多色彩。此功能適用於 MeganeX 和所有其他原生頭戴式顯示器，但僅對支援 10 位元的 VR 應用程式有效。

trans-unit.source: You need to update your driver to use the custom shader.
trans-unit.target: 您需要更新驅動程式才能使用自訂著色器。

trans-unit.source: SteamVR is not running, so this information is not updated.
trans-unit.target: SteamVR 未執行，因此此資訊未更新。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts how zoomed in the FOV is. This can affect world scale. If you don't mind distortion this can be decreased too far to increase visible FOV.
trans-unit.target: 調整視野的縮放程度。這可能會影響世界比例。若您不介意失真，可以將其調得更低以增加可見視野。

trans-unit.source: The time it takes for the display to update after the GPU has finished rendering. This is used to calculate the time warp correction. Setting it too high or low causes tracking to overshoot or undershoot which makes tracking more jittery.
trans-unit.target: GPU 完成渲染後，顯示器更新所需的時間。此數值用於計算時間扭曲校正。設定過高或過低會導致追蹤過衝或不足，使追蹤更加抖動。

trans-unit.source: The time it takes for the display to show the first and last line. This is to combat the same effect you see on yor desktop if you follow a window while you quickly move it side to side.
trans-unit.target: 顯示器顯示第一行到最後一行所需的時間。這是為了對抗您在桌面上快速左右移動視窗時所看到的相同效果。

trans-unit.source: The angle each eye is rotated outwards. With some training it might allow increasing FOV at the expense if binocular overlap and comfort. For every 1 degree this is increased 2 degrees of fov are added. This will mess with your eyes in and out of VR unless you do some extreme modding to the headset.
trans-unit.target: 每隻眼睛向外旋轉的角度。經過一些訓練後，或許可以犧牲雙眼重疊範圍和舒適度來增加視野。此數值每增加 1 度，視野就會增加 2 度。除非您對頭戴式顯示器進行極端的改裝，否則這會在 VR 內外都對您的眼睛造成影響。

trans-unit.source: Disables an eye. This can provide more performance to the remaining eye once the game is restarted. Eyes can not be completely disabled in SteamVR so this covers the entire eye with the hidden area mesh. The hidden area mesh change does require a restart and may black out the desktop view. It can also sets the FOV extremely low when disableEyeDecreaseFov is manually set in settings.json, but that can cause issues.
trans-unit.target: 停用單隻眼睛。遊戲重新啟動後，這可以為剩餘的眼睛提供更多效能。由於 SteamVR 無法完全停用單眼，此功能會使用隱藏區域網格遮蔽整隻眼睛。隱藏區域網格的變更需要重新啟動，且可能會使桌面檢視變黑。當在 settings.json 中手動設定 disableEyeDecreaseFov 時，它還可以將視野設定得極低，但這可能會導致問題。
降低已停用眼睛的視野

trans-unit.source: Set the FOV to near zero for the disabled eye. By decreasing the FOV, occlusion culling may be able to decrease the rendering load. This can cause issues with some games.
trans-unit.target: 將已停用眼睛的視野設定為接近零。透過降低視野，遮蔽剔除 (occlusion culling) 或許能減少渲染負載。這可能會在某些遊戲中引起問題。

trans-unit.source: The driver folder is not in the default location. Unpack the entire zip and retry, or manually locate the new CustomHeadsetOpenVR folder to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 驅動程式資料夾不在預設位置。請解壓縮整個 zip 檔案後重試，或手動定位要安裝的新的 CustomHeadsetOpenVR 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Install Failed, Make sure SteamVR is closed
trans-unit.target: 安裝失敗，請確認 SteamVR 已關閉

trans-unit.source: Uninstall Failed, Make sure SteamVR is closed
trans-unit.target: 解除安裝失敗，請確認 SteamVR 已關閉
